events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering roles based on your resume and experience.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile and will be your point of contact throughout the hiring process.
The initial screening call was completed, discussing your experience and technical skills in software development.
Thank you for the initial screening. I am excited about the opportunity and look forward to the next steps.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 10 AM UTC to evaluate your coding and problem-solving skills.
The technical interview went well, and you demonstrated strong knowledge in software engineering principles.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 23rd, where we will discuss company culture and benefits.
You completed the HR interview successfully, showing a great fit with our company values and team dynamics.
An official offer has been proposed including salary details and benefits. Please review and provide your feedback.
Thank you for your prompt feedback on the offer. We're glad you find the terms acceptable and look forward to moving ahead.
You have accepted the job offer. Welcome to the team! We are excited to have you on board.
Your onboarding process has begun. You will receive all necessary materials and access details shortly.
The hiring process is now officially closed. Thank you for joining us, and we wish you a successful career here.
